name: Wise Package Studio Installer Package
summary: Learn about .WSI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WSI files are similar to .MSI files, but are used specifically by Wise Package Studio.
NOTE: Wise Installation Studio and Wise Installation Express were discontinued on April 19, 2010.

description: Package created with Wise Package Studio, an installer creation utility; contains a collection of files that have been packaged into a single archive; can be installed on a Windows system using Wise Package Studio.
